title: Colt in the Hand of the Devil

sources.title: Colt in the Hand of the Devil (1973) Outlaw's Vow for Vengeance - SPAGHETTI WESTERN
sources.description:
When a cowboy is released from prison he fulfils a promise to visit a town run by a gang of ruthless gunmen. In doing so he makes a lot of enemies.

Original title: Una colt in mano al diavolo (1973)

This film is available with Portuguese & Italian audio, and subtitled in many language options.

Director: Gianfranco Baldanello
Writers: Augusto Finocchi, Gianfranco Baldanello
Stars: Robert Woods, William Berger, George Wang
Genres: Italian cinema, Western movie


00:00 Full Movie (with dubbed audio and subtitles)
05:17 Risky deals unfold in a western town as a stranger seeks information and faces danger.
12:38 A tale of revenge and redemption unfolds in a town plagued by crime and corruption.
19:50 Revengeful sheriff uncovers a sinister plot in a town plagued by violence and deception.
32:39  Legal proceedings reveal betrayal and deceit, leading to a lifetime sentence for Jeremy Scott.
49:03 Deception and betrayal unfold as secrets are revealed in a deadly trap.
55:16 Revenge plot unfolds as outlaws seek justice through deceit and violence in a western setting.


@CultCinemaClassics
